title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Elementary Grade 4 Resource-Based Integrated Mathematics and Language Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic skills and ability to comprehend simple sentences
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can write logical descriptive texts of five or more sentences to explain mathematical situations.
Learners can convert everyday life problems into mathematical language and solve them using digital tools.
Participants can collaborate with peers to create multimedia materials (videos/infographics) explaining mathematical concepts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
